friends.shortShareMessage: Check out farmerJoe for your smartphone. Download it today from {{url}}.
friends.emailMessage:
Hey,

I just downloaded farmerJoe for my {{phone}}.

farmerJoe is a documentation app for farmers that is easy to use. With the app you can see your fields and crops on a map, you can add notes with a picture. You can set wait times and record fertilisers.

farmerJoe is available for iPhone and Android.

Install it from {{url}}.

password.youNeedToEnterCurrent: You need to enter your current password.
password.wrong: The password is not correct. If you don't know it use the Forgotten Password link.
password.minXchars: The password must be at least {{length}} characters long.
password.atLeastXUppercase: The password must contain at least {{length}} uppercase.
password.atLeastXLowercase: The password must contain at least {{length}} uppercase.
password.atLeastNumberOrSpecialCharacter: The password must contain at least {{length}} digit or Special character.
password.expiredActionCode: The password reset link that you've clicked on has expired. Please request a new password reset.
password.invalidActionCode: The password link you've clicked on is either malformed or has been already used.
password.requiresRecentLogin: You haven't logged in recently. To continue please enter your password first.

forgotten_password_mail_sent_to: We have sent an email to {0} with a link to reset your password. Please follow the instructions in the email to reset your password.

languages.really_change: Are you sure you want to change the language to {{language}}?

contact.dontDeleteData: Please don't delete the following data. We need it to properly identify you in the system. So then we can offer you better Support.

slide1.title: Thank you for choosing farmerJoe
slide1.description: Now you can easily and efficiently optimize your production.

slide2.title: Manage several Farms
slide2.description: Keep up with what's going on in your Farms with ease.

slide3.title: Easy documentation
slide3.description: Write down the stuff that's important to you. Make photos that you want to keep.

slide4.title: Find your fields with ease
slide4.description: Immediately have the overview on all fields. Use the crop age and wait time count down for your decisions.

slide5.title: Order analyses
slide5.description: Order Analyses with your smartphone. The results of them are directly fed back to your field documentation.

slide6.title: Add your employees
slide6.description: Use the power of your team to work better.

needLocation.title: farmerJoe needs your location
needLocation.description: farmerJoe is currently not allowed to access your location.

needAlwaysLocation.title: Location permission not granted
needAlwaysLocation.description: To share your live location farmerJoe needs to always access your location. If you don't grant this permission you can't use this feature.

cantDetermineLocation.title: farmerJoe cannot determine your location.
cantDetermineLocation.description: Please turn on your phone's GPS on.

needPhotoLibrary.title: Cannot access image
needPhotoLibrary.description: Please allow access if you want to be able to select images.

needCameraAccess.title: Cannot access camera
needCameraAccess.description: Please allow access to your camera if you want to take photos.

needContactsAccess.title: farmerJoe needs access to your contacts
needContactsAccess.description: If you want to invite someone from your address book, please grant FarmerJoe access to contacts.

sketchNeedsStorage.title: farmerJoe needs storage access
sketchNeedsStorage.description: In order for us to manipulate the image we need access to your storage. Without this permission you won't be able to submit the image.

users.userRight: The user can see other Employees in the farm.

fieldAdminAlert.message: The user is Administrator and has access on all fields in the company. If you want to forbid his access to this field & other fields you would have to make him a normal user.

userHasAccessToAllFields.message: The user has access to all fields in the company. If you want to forbid his access to this field & other fields you would have to edit his profile & change his access from all fields to only fields that you select.

grantFieldAlert.message: Do you really want to give {{name}} access to this field?

fields.standardUserRights: The user can't create or edit fields.

near.cantSortNoLocation: We can't sort the nearest by fields, because you haven't allowed us access to your location.

registerScreen.helpEasySteps: We'll help you create an account in a few easy steps.
registerScreen.useRealName: Using your real name makes it easier for colleagues to recognise you in your farms.
registerScreen.weUsePhone: The number will be shown to colleagues in your Farms and they'll be able to easily call you.
registerScreen.weUseEmail: You'll use this email address when you log in and if you ever need to reset your password. Other farmerJoe users will be able to invite you in their Farms with this email.
registerScreen.passwordHelp: Enter a combination of at least {{length}} numbers, letters and punctuation marks (like ! and &)
registerScreen.confrim_agb_data_security: By tapping "Create Account", you agree to our {0}. Learn how we collect and use your data in our {1}, and how we use cookies and similar technology in our {2}.
registerScreen.errorEmailExist: Another account already users this email address.
